summary: Defines a base class for Vision-and-Language Transformer (ViLT) pretrained models, handling configuration, weight initialization, and common utilities needed to instantiate and manage a pretrained multimodal transformer.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly load and fine‑tune a state‑of‑the‑art vision‑language model for applications such as image‑text retrieval, visual question answering, and multimodal understanding.
